from datetime import datetime
def convert_date(day, first_day="01-01-2020", sep='-'):
    d1 = first_day.replace('-', sep)
    fmt = f'%d{sep}%m{sep}%Y'
    d1 = datetime.strptime(d1, fmt)
    d2 = datetime.strptime(day, fmt)
    delta = d2 - d1
    return delta.days
